name: Solo's Journey and Fantia's Plight
description:
Experience the epic tale of a world's fight against the evil that plagues it. Fight against hordes of demons, golems, and (angry radishes? ) other malevolent forces in a quest to finally defeat the mastermind behind it all.

With an enormous overworld full of towns and dungeons, 200+ unique pieces of equipment, 10+ unique classes, and over TEN BILLION skill load-out combinations, the journey never ends!

*Note: The permissions for the app are not actually used except for read/write on SD card. The other permissions are just default plugins in Cordova and PhoneGap.
